resources.string: Calculation of reactive power from capacity
Info Calculation of power factor correction
The app is used to calculate various parameters which are required for the design and setting of reactive current compensation.

Calculation of the detuning frequency from the inductance and the capacitance.
Capacitance: Capacitance of a capacitor in uF
Inductance: Inductance of the series reactor in mH
Frequency: Nominal frequency of the installation

Calculation of reactive power based on active power and cos phi.
Power: active power of the consumer according to nameplate in kW
cos phi: cos phi of the consumer according to nameplate
Target cos phi: Desired cos phi after compensation

Calculation of reactive power based on capacity.
star/delta: circuit type
5%,7%,14%: Detuning factor
Voltage: Rated voltage at capacitor
Capacity: Capacity of a capacitor
Frequency: Rated frequency of installation

Calculation of the C/K-Value for setting the first step for reactive power controllers.
Current transformer Pri.: Current transformer value on the primary side e.g. 1000A
Current transformer sec.: Current transformer value on the secondary side e.g. 5A
Smallest stage: Smallest stage of the installed PFC in kvar
Calculation of the required reactive power using the EW-Bill
Berechnung der Blindleistung anhand der EW-Rechnung.
